text: The municipality is located in Krapina-Zagorje County in northern Croatia Zagorska Sela is a village and municipality in Krapina-Zagorje County in Croatia. According to the 2001 census, there are 1,197 inhabitants in the area, absolute majority of which are Croats. Category:Populated places in Krapina-Zagorje County Category:Municipalities of Croatia
title: Zagorska Sela
